elements.name: Login with valid user authentication

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user perform login with username "admin" and password "hero"
after login, page 'Your Profile' is opened
the user click on Logout link
after logout, Login Page is displayed

elements.name: Login with invalid user authentication

the user perform login with username "test" and password "test"
after login, the message "Wrong credentials. You can do it, try again!" is displayed on header status bar

arguments.val: Wrong credentials. You can do it, try again!

name: New WAES's portal, and the initial functionality: login - Successful and Unsuccessful login

elements.name: Verify validation when the username field is empty during login process

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user click on login button
on login page, the user click on Log In button
on login page, "username" field is validated with the text "Please fill out this field."

elements.name: Verify validation when the password field is empty during login process

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user click on login button
on Login page, the user input into username box the value "test"
on login page, the user click on Log In button
on login page, "password" field is validated with the text "Please fill out this field."

name: New WAES's portal, and the initial functionality: login - Errors Verifications

elements.name: Verify Details Information Page after successful login

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user perform login with username "admin" and password "hero"
after login, page 'Your Profile' is opened
the user click on Details button
Details page is displayed
the Name "Amazing Admin" is displayed
the Email address "a.admin@wearewaes.com" is displayed
the user click on Logout link
after logout, Login Page is displayed

elements.name: Verify Profile Information Page after successful login

the user perform login with username "admin" and password "hero"
after login, page 'Your Profile' is opened
the user click on Profile button
Profile page is displayed
the question information "How are you doing, Amazing Admin?" is displayed

arguments.val: How are you doing, Amazing Admin?

steps.name: the power information "Your super power: Change the course of a waterfall." is displayed

arguments.val: Your super power: Change the course of a waterfall.

steps.name: the extended information "is" displayed
the user click on Logout link
after logout, Login Page is displayed

name: New WAES's portal, and the initial functionality: login - Profile Verifications

elements.name: Sign Up with a new valid user

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user perform SignUp using: username "test", password "test", name "test", email "test@test.com", day "25", month "April", year "1984"
after signUp, page 'Your Profile' is opened
after signUp, the Welcome message "Welcome to your new profile page, test!" is displayed

arguments.val: Welcome to your new profile page, test!

steps.name: the user click on Logout link
after logout, Login Page is displayed

elements.name: Verify Sign Up error verification when the user is already registered (username/email)

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user perform SignUp using: username "admin", password "test", name "New User", email "new@wearewaes.com", day "25", month "April", year "1984"
unsuccessful SignUp error is displayed

name: New WAES's portal, and the initial functionality: SignUp - Successful and Unsuccessful SignUp

elements.name: Verify validation when the username field is empty during SignUp process

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user click on SignUp button
on SignUp page, the user click on Submit button
on SignUp page, "username" field is validated with the text "Please fill out this field."

elements.name: Verify validation when the password field is empty during SignUp process

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user click on SignUp button
SignUp Page is displayed
on SignUp page, the user input into username box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user click on Submit button
on SignUp page, "password" field is validated with the text "Please fill out this field."

elements.name: Verify validation when the name field is empty during SignUp process

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user click on SignUp button
SignUp Page is displayed
on SignUp page, the user input into username box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into password box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user click on Submit button
on SignUp page, "name" field is validated with the text "Please fill out this field."

elements.name: Verify validation when the email field doesn't have the correct format during SignUp process

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user click on SignUp button
SignUp Page is displayed
on SignUp page, the user input into username box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into password box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into name box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into email box the value ""
on SignUp page, "email" field is validated with the text "Please fill out this field."

elements.name: Verify validation when the email field doesn't have the correct format during SignUp process

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user click on SignUp button
SignUp Page is displayed
on SignUp page, the user input into username box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into password box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into name box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into email box the value "new"
on SignUp page, "email" field is validated with the text "Please include an '@' in the email address. 'new' is missing an '@'."

arguments.val: Please include an '@' in the email address. 'new' is missing an '@'.

elements.name: Verify validation when the email field doesn't have the correct format during SignUp process

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user click on SignUp button
SignUp Page is displayed
on SignUp page, the user input into username box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into password box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into name box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into email box the value "new@"
on SignUp page, "email" field is validated with the text "Please enter a part following '@'. 'new@' is incomplete."

arguments.val: Please enter a part following '@'. 'new@' is incomplete.

elements.name: Verify validation when the email field doesn't have the correct format during SignUp process

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user click on SignUp button
SignUp Page is displayed
on SignUp page, the user input into username box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into password box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into name box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into email box the value "new@.com"
on SignUp page, "email" field is validated with the text "'.' is used at a wrong position in '.com'."

arguments.val: '.' is used at a wrong position in '.com'.

elements.name: Verify validation when the email field doesn't have the correct format during SignUp process

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user click on SignUp button
SignUp Page is displayed
on SignUp page, the user input into username box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into password box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into name box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into email box the value "new@new."
on SignUp page, "email" field is validated with the text "'.' is used at a wrong position in 'new.'."

arguments.val: '.' is used at a wrong position in 'new.'.

elements.name: Verify validation in the date fields during SignUp process

steps.name: the user is on the WAES's portal page
the user click on SignUp button
SignUp Page is displayed
on SignUp page, the user input into username box the value "test"
on SignUp page, the user input into password box the value "test"

on SignUp page, the user input into email box the value "test@test.com"
on SignUp page, the user click on Submit button
on SignUp page, "day" field is validated with the text "Please select an item in the list."

arguments.val: Please select an item in the list.

steps.name: on SignUp page, the user select as day the value "25"
on SignUp page, the user click on Submit button
on SignUp page, "month" field is validated with the text "Please select an item in the list."

arguments.val: Please select an item in the list.

steps.name: on SignUp page, the user select as month the value "April"
on SignUp page, the user click on Submit button
on SignUp page, "year" field is validated with the text "Please select an item in the list."

arguments.val: Please select an item in the list.
